ComicInfo.Summary: Marty and Fiona join up with the Outcast Super-Apes when they hear that Captain America was replaced by Baron Blood, who then turned all the Invaders into vampires. They all travel to the Arctic where they find the real Cap still frozen in ice, and revive him.
